TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SecurityUtilities extends System.Object
public ref class SecurityUtilities abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組公用程式函式來操作安全性權限集合和簽署。

span.span: Provides a set of utility functions for manipulating security permision sets and signing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet ComputeZonePermissionSet (string targetZone, System.Security.PermissionSet includedPermissionSet, string[] excludedPermissions);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.PermissionSet ComputeZonePermissionSet(string targetZone, class System.Security.PermissionSet includedPermissionSet, string[] excludedPermissions) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComputeZonePermissionSet (targetZone As String, includedPermissionSet As PermissionSet, excludedPermissions As String()) As PermissionSet

public: static System::Security::PermissionSet ^ ComputeZonePermissionSet(System::String ^ targetZone, System::Security::PermissionSet ^ includedPermissionSet, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ excludedPermissions);
static member ComputeZonePermissionSet : string * System.Security.PermissionSet * string[] -> System.Security.PermissionSet

param.name: targetZone
param.span: 指定取自電腦原則的區域預設權限集合。

span.span: Specifies a zone default permission set, which is obtained from machine policy.

param.span: 有效值為 、 或 。

span.span: Valid values are , , or .

param.span: 如果指定 ，則產生的權限集合僅會根據 includedPermissionSet 參數。

span.span: If is specified, the generated permission set is based only on the includedPermissionSet parameter.

param.name: includedPermissionSet
param.span: 物件，包含要明確加入所產生使用權限集合中的使用權限集合。

span.span: A object containing the set of permissions to be explicitly included in the generated permission set.

param.span: 在這個參數中所指定的使用權限將會逐字加入產生的使用權限集合，不論 targetZone 或 excludedPermissions 參數為何。

span.span: Permissions specified in this parameter will be included verbatim in the generated permission set, regardless of targetZone or excludedPermissions parameters.

param.name: excludedPermissions
param.span: 要從區域預設權限集合排除的權限識別字串陣列。

span.span: An array of permission identity strings to be excluded from the zone default permission set.

param.span: 使用權限識別字串可以透過 方法計算出來。

span.span: Permission identity strings can be computed using the method.

param.span: 如果 targetZone 不是 或 ，則會忽略這個參數。

span.span: This parameter is ignored if targetZone is not or .

summary.span: 計算區域預設權限集合、移除任何已排除的權限，並加入任何包含的權限，以產生權限集合。

span.span: Generates a permission set by computing the zone default permission set, removing any excluded permissions, and adding any included permissions.

returns.span: 傳回所產生的權限集合。

span.span: Returns the generated permission set.

Public Shared Function IdentityListToPermissionSet (ids As String()) As PermissionSet
public: static System::Security::PermissionSet ^ IdentityListToPermissionSet(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ids);
static member IdentityListToPermissionSet : string[] -> System.Security.PermissionSet

param.name: ids
param.span: 權限身分識別字串陣列。

span.span: An array of permission identity strings.

summary.span: 將權限身分識別字串陣列轉換成權限集合物件。

span.span: Converts an array of permission identity strings to a permission set object.

returns.span: 傳回已轉換的權限集合。

span.span: Returns the converted permission set.

param.name: permissionSet
param.span: 輸入的權限設定為要轉換。

span.span: The input permission set to be converted.

summary.span: 將權限集合物件轉換為權限識別字串陣列。

span.span: Converts a permission set object to an array of permission identity strings.

returns.span: 傳回權限身分識別字串陣列。

span.span: Returns an array of permission identity strings.

summary.span: 簽署 ClickOnce 資訊清單或 PE 檔。

span.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest or PE file.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SignFile (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 cert, Uri timestampUrl, string path);
.method public static hidebysig void SignFile(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 cert, class System.Uri timestampUrl, string path) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SignFile (cert As X509Certificate2, timestampUrl As Uri, path As String)
public: static void SignFile(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ cert, Uri ^ timestampUrl, System::String ^ path);
static member SignFile : System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 * Uri * string -> unit

param.name: cert
param.span: 要用來簽署檔案的憑證。

span.span: The certificate to be used to sign the file.

param.name: timestampUrl
param.span: 表示檔案要由指定 HTTP 位址的時間戳記伺服器加上時間戳記。

span.span: Indicates that the file is to be timestamped by the timestamp server at the specified HTTP address.

param.span: 如果您不需要時間戳記，這個參數可以是 NULL。

span.span: This parameter can be NULL if you do not want a timestamp.

param.name: path
param.span: 要簽署的檔案名稱。

span.span: The name of the file to sign.

summary.span: 簽署 ClickOnce 資訊清單或 PE 檔。

span.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest or PE file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 X509Certificate2 參數代表目前使用者的個人憑證存放區中的憑證，此函式只可以登入的 PE 檔。This function can only sign a PE file if the X509Certificate2 parameter represents a certificate in the current user's personal certificate store. 這個多載方法的呼叫 SignTool.exe，因此需要[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]安裝。This overload of the method calls SignTool.exe and therefore requires the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to be installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SignFile (string certThumbprint, Uri timestampUrl, string path);
.method public static hidebysig void SignFile(string certThumbprint, class System.Uri timestampUrl, string path) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SignFile (certThumbprint As String, timestampUrl As Uri, path As String)
public: static void SignFile(System::String ^ certThumbprint, Uri ^ timestampUrl, System::String ^ path);
static member SignFile : string * Uri * string -> unit

param.name: certThumbprint
param.span: 指定保留在個人憑證存放區中的指模 (即簽署憑證的 SHA1 雜湊)。

span.span: Specifies the thumbprint, which is the SHA1 hash of the signing certificate, which is kept in your personal certificate store.

param.name: timestampUrl
param.span: 表示檔案要由指定 HTTP 位址的時間戳記伺服器加上時間戳記。

span.span: Indicates that the file is to be timestamped by the timestamp server at the specified HTTP address.

param.span: 如果您不需要時間戳記，這個參數可以是 NULL。

span.span: This parameter can be NULL if you do not want a timestamp.

param.name: path
param.span: 要簽署的檔案名稱。

span.span: The name of the file to sign.

summary.span: 簽署 ClickOnce 資訊清單或 PE 檔。

span.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest or PE file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載方法的呼叫 SignTool.exe，因此需要[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]安裝。This overload of the method calls SignTool.exe and therefore requires the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to be installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SignFile (string certPath, System.Security.SecureString certPassword, Uri timestampUrl, string path);
.method public static hidebysig void SignFile(string certPath, class System.Security.SecureString certPassword, class System.Uri timestampUrl, string path) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SignFile (certPath As String, certPassword As SecureString, timestampUrl As Uri, path As String)
public: static void SignFile(System::String ^ certPath, System::Security::SecureString ^ certPassword, Uri ^ timestampUrl, System::String ^ path);
static member SignFile : string * System.Security.SecureString * Uri * string -> unit

param.name: certPath
param.span: 要用來簽署檔案的憑證。

span.span: The certificate to be used to sign the file.

param.span: 憑證必須包含私密金鑰。

span.span: The certificate must contain a private key.

param.span: 擴充功能為選擇項，但是如果存在，則必須將 設定為 。

span.span: The extension is optional, but if it is present, must be set to .

param.span: 擴充功能也是選擇項，但是如果存在，此憑證就必須包含物件識別項 (OID) 支援。

span.span: The extension is also optional, but if it is present, the certificate must contain object identifier (OID) support.

param.name: certPassword
param.span: 憑證密碼。

span.span: The certificate password.

param.name: timestampUrl
param.span: 表示檔案要由指定 HTTP 位址的時間戳記伺服器加上時間戳記。

span.span: Indicates that the file is to be timestamped by the timestamp server at the specified HTTP address.

param.span: 如果您不需要時間戳記，這個參數可以是 NULL。

span.span: This parameter can be NULL if you do not want a timestamp.

param.name: path
param.span: 要簽署的檔案名稱。

span.span: The name of the file to sign.

summary.span: 簽署 ClickOnce 資訊清單。

span.span: Signs a ClickOnce manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函式是只能用於簽章資訊清單，而不是 PE 檔。This function is only for signing a manifest, not a PE file.

param.name: element
param.span: 權限集合的 XML 表示。

span.span: An XML representation of the permission set.
